title: MUSIC TASTING CLUB WEBSITE
detail: Explore details about the club's history, schedule, FAQs, blog posts and more!

title: TASK ME LATER
detail: A site that helps engineers keep track of project tasks and delegate responsibilities.

title: JUNO
detail: A site that leverages the ChatGPT and Gemini APIs to help local businesses generate marketing campaigns in the form of instagram posts and posters.

title: FURNITURE FLOW
detail: A peer to peer site exclusively for graduating students to sell their furniture to rising Juniors moving off campus.

title: ASK AN AI
detail: Query 3 Generative AI chatbots (ChatGPT, Gemini, and Llama). AskAnAI allows the user to upload a PDF, and have chatbots summarize its contents.

title: MUSIC REVIEWER DATA VISUALIZATION
detail: Anthony Fantano has been reveiwing albums on YouTube for 14 years. Experience a data visualization of his thousands of album reviews!

title: Software Engineering Intern
workDetails: Improved Wix website experience tailored for private chefs and strengthened analytics infrastructure using Google Tag Manager.
Enhanced a Wix-based interest form using embedded HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrating the Google Maps API for location verification and the Verifalia API for email verification.

title: Software Engineering Intern
workDetails: Developing a tile-based scratch-off/pick-your-prize customer experience using Svelte 5, Go, Protocol Buffers, Flowbite, and GitHub.
Constructing the gamified experience to collect email/behavioral data, increasing conversion rates by 10% and strengthening data-driven brand-to-consumer connections.

title: Founder, Former President, & Web Dev
workDetails: Served as President of Northwestern’s music discourse club, led executive board, facilitated discussions on weekly music choices.

Built the club's website using Typescript/React, GitHub Pages, and the MaterialUI library, to market the Music Tasting Club to Northwestern students, catalog previous album picks, answer members’ questions, detail executive board’s duties, and host articles.

title: Software Engineer
workDetails: Worked in JavaScript and with the Google Drive API to automate the creation of attendance sheets for hundreds of tutors, the creation of class resources, and the dispatching of weekly tutor feedback reports to professors.

title: Software Engineering Intern
workDetails: Used Typescript/React and MaterialUI, building in-house web applications to further stem cell research. Created a site that converted a scientist’s desired specifications into instructions that automated research robots implemented.
Practiced AGILE/SCRUM methods as a member of a team, utilizing GitHub to track project progress and scope of work.
